TopicTitle: The illuminator that went into Sun orbit

Articles.Content:
First off, this is not my ship, I can't remember who it was, Adam or something (history is full of useless youtube links, the search bar fails to find creator.)anyways if you want to try it: http://jmp.sh/b/AB13TLgVNr29MeQySIKw

So I was going to send it into orbit. Then when the two side missiles ejected, it broke the main engine, so I had to let it go. Don't post frozen in comments. Then I thought I wasn't going to have enough fuel, but I did, and it went into a HORRIBLE ORBIT . And from my last mistake for a space-station , I knew I had to bring it up from it's low altitude spot on orbit. So then i was aiming for the moon, missed that, then I wen into KERBIN ESCAPEEEEEEEEE! And now I'm trying to sent another object out into.... KERBIN ESCAPE. Will I be able to reach Duna? Or the moon? Find out next time on Kerbal Ball Z... if there is a next time.

Edited January 25, 2015 by SPA
